mapper.select: SELECT p.product_no, p.product_title,product_subtitle,product_main_img,c.product_price,c.product_total,c.product_qty FROM tb_product p, tb_cart c WHERE p.product_no = c.product_no AND c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
select nvl(sum(p.product_price * c.product_qty), 0) product_total from TB_CART c, TB_PRODUCT p where c.product_no = p.product_no and c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
SELECT sum(product_qty) FROM tb_cart WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
SELECT COUNT(product_no) FROM tb_cart WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
